<Rescheduling of Hong Kong Football Association Matches>

All Hong Kong Football Association matches which were originally scheduled to be held from 10 to 13 October, including First, Second, Third Divisions, Jockey Club Women’s League, Jockey Club Futsal League and Jockey Club Youth League, would be rescheduled in order to minimize the possible impacts brought to the fans, parents and players by unforeseeable transportation arrangement near the venues.
